mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(name, email, password, "emailVerified") VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, now())
INSERT INTO t_memma03(email, seq) SELECT #{email} , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(T0.seq), 0) + 1 FROM t_memma03 T0 WHERE T0.email=#{email}) RETURNING email , seq , verification_code , expires
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectVerificationCode */ CASE WHEN verification_code = #{verificationCode} THEN true ELSE false END AS "isVerified" FROM t_memma03 T1 WHERE T1.email = #{email} AND T1.expires >= now() ORDER BY T1.seq DESC LIMIT 1
